root: ^<color=#FFA500>Ground Pounding</color> can activate buttons, damage enemies, and launch you into the air!
^Press <color=blue>Control</color> while in the air to <color=#FFA500>Ground Pound</color>!
^Keep an eye out for <color=#FFA500>Ability</color> <color=green>Health</color>, and <color=#FF0000>Damage</color> canisters!
